alert.note: Alert for Keith; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 7:43PM CDT until May 05 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Perkins County in southwestern Nebraska... South central Keith County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 730 PM MDT. * At 643 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Grant, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ogallala, Grant and Wild Horse Spring. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 64 and 86. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 120 and 128. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
